question: Some experts believe that it is better for children to begin learning a foreign language at primary school rather than secondary school . Do you advantages of this outweigh the disadvantages ?
text: Thesedays , foreign language play a vital role in developing education . From my perspective , I agree with the first view .

Firstly , there are various subjects which are necessery to learn for students at school such as math , history , geography , art … Childrens can not study a lot of subjects at the same time when they are small age , this makes affects to brain of their . Despite the arguement above , there are merits of learning a foreign languages at primary school . Students are in the habit of aping the grown ups , therefore they can learn foreign languages by rapidly way . In the final analysis , I believe that there are a lot of advantages of studying a foreign language , therefore childrens should learned this subjects at primary school in order to create many benefits in their future .
